 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפה‎</span> **verb** ==sink, relax== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, so Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רפא‎</span> (derived species), Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רפה‎</span> Aph\`el, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***an easy life*** is perhaps akin); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular [[Judg.19.9|Judg 19:9]] (yet see below); 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָֽפִ֑תָה‎</span> [[Judg.8.3|Judg 8:3]]; [[Jer.49.24|Jer 49:24]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְפֶּה‎</span> [[Isa.5.24|Isa 5:24]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּרֶף‎</span> [[Exod.4.26|Exod 4:26]] (see below), etc.; — 

**1.** ***sink down***, of hay in flame [[Isa.5.24|Isa 5:24]] ***sink, decline***, of day [[Judg.19.9|Judg 19:9]] (si vera lectio; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">κέκλικεν</span>, [[BDB#GFM|GFM]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָטָה‎</span> [but how explain the difficult <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רפה‎</span>?]). Usu. 

**2.** ***sink, drop*** (of wings, see **Pi\`el**), of hands, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> [[Neh.6.9|Neh 6:9]] ***their hands will drop from the work*** (in fear); elsewhere absolute figurative = ***lose heart, energy***, [[2Sam.4.1|2Sam 4:1]]; [[Isa.13.7|Isa 13:7]]; [[Jer.6.24|Jer 6:24]]; [[Jer.50.43|Jer 50:43]]; [[Ezek.7.17|Ezek 7:17]]; [[Ezek.21.12|Ezek 21:12]]; [[Zeph.3.16|Zeph 3:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרַיִם‎</span> omitted [[Jer.49.24|Jer 49:24]]. 

**3.** ***sink, relax, abate***, of temper [[Judg.8.3|Judg 8:3]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> person). 

**4.** ***relax, withdraw***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person [[Exod.4.26|Exod 4:26]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), i.e. let one alone (but read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֶרֶף‎</span>, see **Hiph\`il**). **Niph\`al** ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְפִּים‎</span> ***idle*** [[Exod.5.8|Exod 5:8]]; [[Exod.5.17|Exod 5:17]] ([[BDB#J|J]]). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִפָּה‎</span> [[Job.12.21|Job 12:21]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּרַפֶּינָה‎</span> [[Ezek.1.24|Ezek 1:24]]; [[Ezek.1.25|Ezek 1:25]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַפֵּא‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75rr»§ 75rr</sup>) [[Jer.38.4|Jer 38:4]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְפִַּים‎</span> [[Ezra.4.4|Ezra 4:4]] — causative: ***let*** wings ***drop*** [[Ezek.1.24|Ezek 1:24]]; [[Ezek.1.25|Ezek 1:25]] (read **Qal**, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כנפיהם‎</span> subject, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] Toy [[BDB#Krae|Krae]] and others, who strike out in v[[Ezek.1.25|Ezek 1:25]]); loosen and ***let drop***, girdle of mighty, figurative for ***weaken*** them [[Job.12.21|Job 12:21]] with accusative hands, figurative for ***enfeeble, dishearten*** [[Jer.38.4|Jer 38:4]]; [[Ezra.4.4|Ezra 4:4]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect***, 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַרְפְּךָ‎</span> [[Deut.4.31|Deut 4:31]] +; jussive 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֶּ֫רֶף‎</span> [[Josh.10.6|Josh 10:6]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְפֵּה‎</span> [[Judg.11.37|Judg 11:37]]; [[2Kgs.4.27|2Kgs 4:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶֶ֫רֶךָ‎</span> [[Deut.9.14|Deut 9:14]] +; masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְפּוּ‎</span> [[Ps.46.11|Ps 46:11]] — causative, 

**1.** ***let drop***, the hand [[2Sam.24.16|2Sam 24:16]] = [[1Chr.21.15|1Chr 21:15]] figurative, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person, = ***abandon***, [[Josh.10.6|Josh 10:6]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); perhaps also (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָד‎</span> omitted) = ***relax, refrain*** [[Exod.4.26|Exod 4:26]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֶרֶף‎</span>, see **Qal**); accusative of thing, = ***abandon, forsake***, [[Neh.6.3|Neh 6:3]], so (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Ps.138.8|Ps 138:8]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, with accusative of person, [[Deut.4.31|Deut 4:31]]; [[Deut.31.6|Deut 31:6]]; [[Deut.31.8|Deut 31:8]]; [[Josh.1.5|Josh 1:5]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[1Chr.28.20|1Chr 28:20]]. 

**2.** ***let go***, suffix person, [[Song.3.4|Song 3:4]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אחז‎</span>); figurative, accusative (omitted) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּסָר‎</span>, [[Prov.4.13|Prov 4:13]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎החזיק‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְדָקָה‎</span> [[Job.27.6|Job 27:6]] (opposed to ***id.***). 

**3.** ***refrain***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person, = ***let*** one ***alone*** [[Judg.11.37|Judg 11:37]]; [[Deut.9.14|Deut 9:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of anger [[Ps.37.8|Ps 37:8]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person [[1Sam.11.3|1Sam 11:3]]; [[2Kgs.4.27|2Kgs 4:27]] accusative of person [[Job.7.19|Job 7:19]] absolute ***let alone***, i.e. do nothing, be quiet, [[1Sam.15.16|1Sam 15:16]]; [[Ps.46.11|Ps 46:11]] (compare Weir in [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[1Sam.15.16|1Sam 15:16]]</sup>). — [[Jer.3.22|Jer 3:22]]; [[Job.5.18|Job 5:18]]; [[Ps.60.4|Ps 60:4]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפָא‎</span>. **Hithpa\`el** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְרַפִּיתָ‎</span> [[Prov.24.10|Prov 24:10]] ***hast shewn thyself slack; Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְרַפֶּה‎</span> [[Prov.18.9|Prov 18:9]] ***one shewing himself slack***, plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְרַפִּים‎</span> [[Josh.18.3|Josh 18:3]]. — See also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפָא‎</span> ***heal.***
